mcq.statement: Choose the sentence with the correct use of a preposition: In Islamabad, it often snows at January., In Islamabad, it often snows in January., In Islamabad, it often snows on January., In Islamabad, it often snows of January.

options.a: In Islamabad, it often snows at January.
options.b: In Islamabad, it often snows in January.
options.c: In Islamabad, it often snows on January.
options.d: In Islamabad, it often snows of January.
